SEARCH
Package muri.logic

Class PolynomialController

java.lang.Object
muri.logic.PolynomialController
public class PolynomialController extends Object
This is the class that handles the communication between the main controller and the Polynomial. It handles the operation requests such as add(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), subtract(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), multiply(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), divide(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), differentiate(java.lang.String) and integrate(java.lang.String). Its interface consists only in strings, polynomial operations being handled by methods from the utility class PolynomialOperations. It uses the PolynomialExtractor class for string to polynomial parsing.

    Constructor that initializes the PolynomialExtractor field

    add(String input1, String input2)
    Takes two string-formatted polynomials, converts them into Polynomial, performs addition using the add method from the utility class PolynomialOperations and prints the result in string format.

    Takes one string-formatted polynomial, converts it into Polynomial, performs derivation using the differentiate method from the utility class PolynomialOperations and prints the result in string format.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public String add(String input1, String input2)
      Takes two string-formatted polynomials, converts them into Polynomial, performs addition using the add method from the utility class PolynomialOperations and prints the result in string format.
      Parameters:
      input1 - first string-formatted polynomial
      input2 - second string-formatted polynomial
      Returns:
      addition of the two polynomials in string format
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the two string are not of polynomial format, rules presented in PolynomialExtractor
